summary: An incredibly talkative secretary, deeply adoring detective films, becomes the accidental witness to the murder of her boss right into the office. Alongside the police investigation, she starts her own amateur one.
cast: Sofiko Chiaureli|Leonid Kuravlyov|Sergey Yurskiy|Elena Solovey|Aleksandr Abdulov|Lyudmila Dmitrieva|Yelena Ukrashchyonok|Leonid Yarmolnik|Vladimir Basov|Nina Ter-Osipyan
title: Ishchite zhenshchinu
